original_title: Entretien avec ma mère, Natalia Akerman
overview: In this 2007 interview, an off-camera Chantal Akerman interviews her mother about her films. The producers of the interview originally intended to edit out Akerman’s questions but ultimately decided to keep them in to preserve the candor of the mother-daughter rapport.
title: Entretien avec ma mère, Natalia Akerman
